newsitem.title: USA: Apogee Medicare billings under review.
newsitem.headline: Apogee Medicare billings under review.

text.p: Apogee Inc said Tuesday that the Department of Health and Human Services and the Department of Justice are reviewing certain Medicare Part B and related co-insurance billings submitted by a subsidiary.

Apogee said it cannot predict when the review will be completed, the outcome, or the potential impact on earnings. The company, however, does not expect the ultimate outcome to have a material adverse impact on its financial condition.
The review is a civil matter relating to billings for services to Medicare patients in long-term care facilities in the State of Florida from January 1, 1994 through mid-1995, Apogee said.
Apogee, which operates outpatient mental health group practices, said it fully cooperating with the review.
